funding-group.funding-statement: There was no external funding received for this study. We acknowledge indirect support provided by Pennsylvania State University's Department of Health Policy and Administration, Demography program, and Population Research Institute. The Population Research Institute is supported by an infrastructure grant from NIH (2R24HD041025-11). This publication was also supported, in part, by Grant UL1 TR000127 and KL2 TR000126 from the National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences (NCATS). The funders provided support in the form of salaries or infrastructure for authors WKB and PYM, but did not have any additional role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript. The specific roles of these authors are articulated in the ‘author contributions’ section.
